task.summary: Default task
Draw bell beneath time slice and avoid creating objects in onDraw
Reduce logging of preferences and log stack trace when finding invalid or incomplete settings
Popup dialog preference moved to shared preference to clarify code and to enable earlier detection of missing settings
Fixed delayed update of countdown view when leaving and return to that view
There are now different activity settings used whether bell is active or meditating and for different meditation periods
Bowl and gap beneath the bell enlarged
There is no need to use :remote for Schedule and UpateStatusNotification and therefore deprecated Context.MODE_MULTI_PROCESS can be replaced
Up-Navigation added to the preferences screen
Meditating flag may not be modified via preferences screen but only by clicking the corresponding button
Button added to go to battery optimization options
Bell activation no longer available via menu - only by button; Options to choose a different number of bells for beginning/interrupting/ending mediation
Meditation dialog enriched with field labels
Option added to keep screen on during meditation
AndroidContextAccessor is now a Singleton, this enable stopping a sound before starting a new one
WakeLock permission removed as it is not need to keep the screen on
NullPointerException fixed which was a follow-up problem of making AndroidContextAccessor a Singleton
Improved meditation notification and MessageFormat used instead of proprietary replace statements
Reverted AndroidContextAccessor to be a Singleton, this prohibits language changes to arrive in preference access.
MediaPlayer stored in a WeakReference so that a started sound can be stopped explicitly but avoiding a memory leak.
Stop ongoing bell sound when meditation is stopped.
Countdown digits enlarged so that 99 fit into time slice.
All defaults moved to one place only (AndroidPrefsAccessor) and removed code redundance for setting preferences to their defaults
All defaults moved to one place only (AndroidPrefsAccessor) and removed code redundance for setting preferences to their defaults and method name cleanup
Removed obsolete local variable
OriginalVolume is now stored in SharedPreferences, this avoids resetting volume originalVolume if the latter has not been set
OriginalVolume is now stored in SharedPreferences, this avoids resetting volume originalVolume if the latter has not been set
As everything runs on the same thread now RingingLogic with KeepAlive could be removed completely. This makes more clear which way calls are going.
As everything runs on the same process now RingingLogic with KeepAlive could be removed completely. This makes more clear which way calls are going.
Ringing comprises displaying the bell, playing sound and vibrating. Being muted in turn means nothing of all three (from now on no display, too).
Ringing comprises displaying the bell, playing sound and vibrating. Being muted in turn means nothing of all three (from now on no display, too).
Use number picker dialogs for choosing mediation parameters
Use number picker dialogs for choosing mediation parameters
Use number picker dialogs for choosing mediation parameters
Use number picker dialogs for choosing mediation parameters
Use different color for ramp-up countdown string instead of a colon as prefix
Status-icon is now enabled by default so warning comes up on insufficient permissions, then warning leads users directly to the preferences
MindBell can now be muted manually by a button in the status notification
MindBell can now be muted manually by a button in the status notification or by an entry in the action menu
MindBell can now be muted manually by a button in the status notification or by an entry in the action menu
MindBell can now be muted manually by a button in the status notification or by an entry in the action menu
Release candidate built
New branch ... new version
Forgotten translation
Request READ_PHONE_STATE permission on first application startup
ReleaseCandidate for 3.0.1 created
Request permission(s) on first startup to allow defaults (isStatus && isMuteOffHook)
Version 3.0.1 released
Version 3.0.2 released with fixing the mute-for-hours-feature ... was erroneously muted for minutes only
Version 3.0.2 released with fixing the mute-for-hours-feature ... was erroneously muted for minutes only

MESSAGE.value: Improved meditation notification and MessageFormat used instead of proprietary replace statements
Reverted AndroidContextAccessor to be a Singleton, this prohibits language changes to arrive in preference access.
MediaPlayer stored in a WeakReference so that a started sound can be stopped explicitly but avoiding a memory leak.
Stop ongoing bell sound when meditation is stopped.
Countdown digits enlarged so that 99 fit into time slice.
All defaults moved to one place only (AndroidPrefsAccessor) and removed code redundance for setting preferences to their defaults
All defaults moved to one place only (AndroidPrefsAccessor) and removed code redundance for setting preferences to their defaults and method name cleanup
Removed obsolete local variable
OriginalVolume is now stored in SharedPreferences, this avoids resetting volume originalVolume if the latter has not been set
As everything runs on the same thread now RingingLogic with KeepAlive could be removed completely. This makes more clear which way calls are going.
As everything runs on the same process now RingingLogic with KeepAlive could be removed completely. This makes more clear which way calls are going.
Ringing comprises displaying the bell, playing sound and vibrating. Being muted in turn means nothing of all three (from now on no display, too).
Use number picker dialogs for choosing mediation parameters
Use different color for ramp-up countdown string instead of a colon as prefix
Status-icon is now enabled by default so warning comes up on insufficient permissions, then warning leads users directly to the preferences
MindBell can now be muted manually by a button in the status notification
MindBell can now be muted manually by a button in the status notification or by an entry in the action menu
Release candidate built
New branch ... new version
Forgotten translation
Request READ_PHONE_STATE permission on first application startup
ReleaseCandidate for 3.0.1 created
Request permission(s) on first startup to allow defaults (isStatus && isMuteOffHook)
Version 3.0.1 released
Version 3.0.2 released with fixing the mute-for-hours-feature ... was erroneously muted for minutes only
